decision_tree.nodes: [{"id": "n1", "type": "Question", "question": "Does the patient have a diagnosis of Congestive Heart Failure (CHF)?", "data_type": "boolean", "help_text": "Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) is a chronic, progressive condition in which the heart muscle isn't pumping blood as well as it should. This can lead to fluid buildup in the lungs, legs, and other parts of the body. Common symptoms include shortness of breath, fatigue, and swelling in the legs and ankles.", "validation": [{"key": "required", "value": "true"}], "connections": [{"target_node_id": "n_chf_yes", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "true"}, {"target_node_id": "n_chf_no", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "false"}]}, {"id": "n2", "type": "question", "question": "What is the patient's age?", "data_type": "number", "help_text": "Please enter the patient's age in years. This information is crucial for assessing risk and guiding treatment decisions.", "validation": [{"key": "min", "value": "0"}, {"key": "max", "value": "120"}], "connections": []}, {"id": "n3", "type": "question", "question": "Has the patient received prior therapy for this condition?", "data_type": "boolean", "help_text": "This refers to any previous treatments, including chemotherapy, radiation, surgery, or targeted therapy, administered specifically for the current diagnosis.", "validation": [{"key": "required", "value": "true"}], "connections": [{"target_node_id": "n4", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "true"}, {"target_node_id": "n4", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "false"}]}, {"id": "n4", "type": "QUESTION", "question": "Is the patient's clinical presentation appropriate for the intended treatment?", "data_type": "BOOLEAN", "help_text": "This refers to whether the patient's signs, symptoms, and overall condition align with the established indications for the proposed therapy, considering contraindications and patient-specific factors.", "validation": [{"key": "required", "value": "true"}], "connections": [{"target_node_id": "n5", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "true"}, {"target_node_id": "n_chf_no", "condition": "EQUALS", "condition_value": "false"}]}, {"id": "n5", "type": "question", "question": "Was baseline documentation completed?", "data_type": "boolean", "help_text": "This refers to the documentation required before initiating treatment, such as patient history, physical examination, and relevant diagnostic tests.", "validation": [{"key": "required", "value": "true"}], "connections": []}, {"id": "n6", "type": "outcome", "outcome": "Treatment not recommended due to inappropriate clinical presentation.", "connections": []}, {"id": "n_chf_yes", "type": "outcome", "outcome": "Patient has CHF. Further evaluation and management are required.", "connections": []}, {"id": "n_chf_no", "type": "outcome", "outcome": "Patient does not have CHF. Proceed with standard care.", "connections": []}]
